trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理的方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Although data binding is not supported for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, it is possible to modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells.
trans-unit.target: 尽管不支持数据绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件，它是可以修改内容以及各个日期单元格的格式设置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is displayed on a Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件显示在网页上，它会创建并汇编构成控件的组件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event is raised when each date cell in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>引发事件时的每一天中的单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>创建控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>

trans-unit.source: You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell when it is created by providing code in the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以控制的内容和提供的事件处理程序中的代码创建时的日期单元格格式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>

trans-unit.source: For more information on customizing the contents of a date cell, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 自定义日期单元格的内容的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a DayRenderEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当创建 DayRenderEventHandler 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
